import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { Button } from '../../Common/Static' import { RsvpEdit } from './RsvpEdit' export default function RsvpIndividual(props) { const [editForm, setEditForm] = useState(false) return ( <>
{editForm ? ( ) : (

{props.selected.name}

{props.selected.email === '' ? 'NA' : props.selected.email}

{props.selected.response}

)}
) }
